verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Speak<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, There shall <S%H3808>none<s%> be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead<s%> among his <S%H5971>people:<s%>

But for his <S%H7607>kin,<s%> that is <S%H7138>near<s%> to him, that is, for his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and for his <S%H1>father,<s%> and for his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and for his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and for his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And for his <S%H269>sister<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> that is <S%H7138>near<s%> to him, <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>husband;<s%> for her may he be <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>
But he shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself, being a <S%H1167>chief<s%> <S%H1167>man<s%> among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> himself.

They shall not make <S%H7144>baldness<s%> on their <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H1548>shave<s%> off the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of their <S%H2206>beard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> make any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in their <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

They shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to their <S%H430>God,<s%> and not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>God:<s%> for the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire, and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H430>God,<s%> they do <S%H7126>offer:<s%> therefore they shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

They shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> that is a <S%H2181>whore,<s%> or <S%H2491>profane;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1644>put<s%> away from her <S%H376>husband:<s%> for he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to his <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him therefore; for he <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God:<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to you: for I the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> you, am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> she <S%H2490>profane<s%> herself by playing the <S%H2181>whore,<s%> she <S%H2490>profanes<s%> her <S%H1>father:<s%> she shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And he that is the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> on <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> was <S%H3332>poured,<s%> and that is <S%H3027>consecrated<s%> to <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H899>garments,<s%> shall not <S%H6544>uncover<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6533>rend<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother;<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of his <S%H430>God;<s%> for the <S%H5145>crown<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is on him: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> in her <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

A <S%H490>widow,<s%> or a <S%H1644>divorced<s%> woman, or <S%H2491>profane,<s%> or an <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall he not <S%H3947>take:<s%> but he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of his own <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall he <S%H2490>profane<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> among his <S%H5971>people:<s%> for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be of your <S%H2233>seed<s%> in their <S%H1755>generations<s%> that <S%H1961>has<s%> any <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> let him not <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> he be that has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> he shall not <S%H7126>approach:<s%> a <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6455>lame,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> he that has a <S%H2763>flat<s%> <S%H2763>nose,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> any thing <S%H8311>superfluous,<s%>
<S%H176>Or<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> that is broken <S%H7667>footed,<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> broken <S%H7667>handed,<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> hunch <S%H1384>back,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H1851>dwarf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that has a <S%H8400>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5869>eye,<s%> or be <S%H1618>scurvy,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabbed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> has his <S%H810>stones<s%> <S%H4790>broken;<s%>

No <S%H376>man<s%> that has a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the offerings of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made by fire: he has a <S%H3971>blemish;<s%> he shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>
He shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> both of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and of the <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

<S%H389>Only<s%> he shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has a <S%H3971>blemish;<s%> that he <S%H2490>profane<s%> not my <S%H4720>sanctuaries:<s%> for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> it to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
